p: W. Ekasari et al. reported the antimalarial activity of various parts of Helianthus annuus in both in vitro and in vivo assays. Inhibition of heme detoxification was also evaluated by the Î²-hematin level. The study revealed that the ethanol extracts of root of H. annuus showed promise as a new source for the development of new plant-based antimalarial agent.
